Docs.title: ContentDrive User Guide
Docs.subtitle: Turn Google Sheets into an AI-Powered Content Operation System.

Hero.description: ContentDrive is your AI-powered strategist, turning your ideas into perfectly briefed content campaigns inside Google Sheets. <green>You</green> provide the spark, <yellow>AI</yellow> does the heavy lifting.

Workflow.description: ContentDrive transforms your manual process into a seamless, AI-powered pipeline.
Workflow.card1Desc: Stop letting great ideas die in messy notes. Our AI Strategy Refiner takes your raw input and instantly transforms it into a professional, six-part strategic brief that guides your entire workflow.
Workflow.card2Desc: Use your approved strategy to fuel an AI-powered brainstorm. The Idea Lab generates a list of high-impact topics and scores them, so you always know you're working on the right content.
Workflow.card3Desc: Go from a prioritized idea to a complete writer's brief in a single click. The AI generates a detailed outline, objectives, and a call-to-action, ready for your creative team to execute instantly.

Agents.description: ContentDrive isn't a single AI. It's a system of specialized agents, each an expert at its specific task in the content workflow.
Agents.agent1Desc: Transforms your raw, unstructured notes into a professional, six-part Core Strategy that guides the entire campaign.
Agents.agent2Desc: Reads your approved strategy and generates dozens of high-impact, relevant content ideas for you to review and prioritize.
Agents.agent3Desc: Takes a single approved idea and suggests the optimal format, a unique angle, a compelling title, and a primary SEO keyword.

BeyondBrief.description: ContentDrive is more than a planner. It's an <strong1>orchestration engine</strong1> that dispatches your approved briefs to specialized AI production pipelines.
BeyondBrief.pipelineATitle: Pipeline A: The Full Article Writer
BeyondBrief.pipelineADesc: Stop staring at a <strong1>blank page</strong1>. Dispatch your brief to our <strong2>Writer Agent</strong2>, a multi-agent system that takes your AI-generated outline and writes a completely SEO-friendly first draft of your article with images.
BeyondBrief.pipelineALabel: ⭐ Included as credits in Pro & Business plans
BeyondBrief.pipelineBTitle: Pipeline B: Full Digital Asset Suite
BeyondBrief.pipelineBDesc: Multiply your impact without multiplying your effort. Dispatch your brief to our <strong1>Digital Asset Suite</strong1> to generate a full set of promotional materials: Google Slide deck, social media images, distinct audio, and video scripts. Supports multiple languages!
BeyondBrief.pipelineBLabel: ⭐ Included as credits in Business plan

Empathy.title: Sound Familiar?
Empathy.description: ContentDrive was built <strong1>for the overwhelmed marketer</strong1> who's juggling too much.
Empathy.point1: You're the entire marketing team, trying to manage a hundred "great ideas" from across the company.
Empathy.point2: Your 'content calendar' is a chaotic spreadsheet that feels more like a graveyard for good intentions.
Empathy.point3: You know you need a better system, but you don't have the time to build one or the budget for expensive platforms.
Empathy.point4: You spend more time managing the process than you do creating great content.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.a1: ContentDrive is a smart add-on for Google Sheets that transforms your familiar spreadsheet into a powerful, AI-driven content orchestration engine. It’s designed to manage your entire content pre-production workflow, from refining a raw idea into a solid strategy to generating a detailed brief.
FAQ.q2: Is this just another AI writer like ChatGPT?
FAQ.a2: Not at all. While we use powerful AI, ContentDrive is a strategic workflow tool, not just a writer. Its primary purpose is to solve the operational chaos that happens before you write. It provides a structured process for planning, ideation, and prioritization.
FAQ.q3: What do I get with the Free plan?
FAQ.a3: The Free plan gives you access to the complete core workflow. You can use the AI Strategy Refiner, brainstorm ideas, and generate up to 5 complete, detailed writer's briefs per month.
FAQ.a4: ContentDrive was built for overwhelmed marketers, solo content creators, and small business owners who need to standardize their workflow and scale content production efficiently without adding headcount.
FAQ.q5: Can I cancel my plan at any time?
FAQ.a5: Absolutely. You have full control over your subscription. You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your plan at any time, no questions asked.
